sqlMap.update:
/* POPUP.updatePopupFileInfo */
UPDATE POPUP_INFO SET REAL_FILE_NAME = #real_file_name# , SAVE_FILE_NAME = #save_file_name# , FILE_PATH = #file_path# WHERE POPUP_KEY = #popup_key#

/* POPUP.updatePopupInfo */
UPDATE POPUP_INFO SET MOD_DATE = NOW() , KIND = #kind# , TITLE = #title# , LINK_ADDRESS = #link_address# , IS_NEW_WINDOW = #is_new_window# , WIDTH_SIZE = #width_size# , HEIGHT_SIZE = #height_size# , TOP_MARGIN = #top_margin# , LEFT_MARGIN = #left_margin# , START_SHOW_DATE = #start_show_date# , END_SHOW_DATE = #end_show_date# , REAL_FILE_NAME = #real_file_name# , SAVE_FILE_NAME = #save_file_name# , FILE_PATH = #file_path# , STATUS = #status# WHERE POPUP_KEY = #popup_key#

/* POPUP.deletePopupInfo */
UPDATE POPUP_INFO SET MOD_DATE = NOW() , STATUS = 'D' WHERE POPUP_KEY = #popup_key#
sqlMap.select:
/* POPUP.getPopupInfo */
SELECT FROM POPUP_INFO WHERE STATUS IN ('Y','N') AND POPUP_KEY = #popup_key#

/* POPUP.getPopupList */
SELECT
, CASE WHEN START_SHOW_DATE <= date_format(sysdate(),'%Y-%m-%d') AND END_SHOW_DATE >= date_format(sysdate(),'%Y-%m-%d') THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS IS_SHOW_YN
FROM POPUP_INFO WHERE STATUS IN ('Y','N') ORDER BY POPUP_KEY DESC LIMIT #recordRowNum# , #pageSize#

/* POPUP.getMainPopupList */
SELECT
, CASE WHEN START_SHOW_DATE <= date_format(sysdate(),'%Y-%m-%d') AND END_SHOW_DATE >= date_format(sysdate(),'%Y-%m-%d') THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS IS_SHOW_YN
FROM POPUP_INFO WHERE STATUS = 'Y' HAVING IS_SHOW_YN = 'Y'
